resources.string:
"Author: Minghui Liao 
Version Number: 1.0 
Instructions: 
1- For searching news: Firstly, input the keyword, and then press "SEARCH" button 
" "2 - For news details: Click an article from the list to view more details 
" "3 - For saving news: Press "SAVE TO FAVOURITE" to save the news. In the list view, press 'FAVOURITE' to view you list of saved news 
" "4 - For removing news, click the news you want to remove and then press "REMOVE FROM FAVOURITE" 
'"
"Activity's Titile: Soccer Games\nAuthor: Minghui Liao \nVersion Number: 1.0 "
